forest.title: Forest Awakening
forest.text: You find yourself in a dense forest. Some supplies lie next to you. What do you do?

settlement.title: The Village
settlement.text: You discover a small empty village ahead. It's eerily quiet. What do you do?

explore.title: Explore Buildings
explore.text: You find three buildings: a red house, a food hall, and a small blue house. Where do you go?

wolf.title: A Wolf Appears!
wolf.text: A loud growl breaks the silence. A wolf has emerged not even 10 yards in front of you. What do you do?

fight.title: Stand Your Ground
fight.text: You stand your ground and prepare to defend yourself

choices.text: If you do not have food

road.title: The Road
road.text: You reach a road. Where do you go?

win.title: New Settlement - WIN
win.text: You reach a new settlement and are welcomed. You survived!

lose.title: Game Over
lose.text: Survival was not meant to be. Better luck next time!
